title: KisPay - Digital Wallet & Payment System
description: A full-stack digital wallet and payment platform built with React & TypeScript on the frontend and Spring Boot with MySQL on the backend, enabling secure and seamless financial transactions in Ethiopia.
Features include user registration & authentication, wallet balance management, peer-to-peer money transfers, bill payments, mobile top-ups, and comprehensive transaction history tracking.
Integrated major Ethiopian payment gateways: Telebirr, CBE Birr, Awash Bank, and Kacha for seamless fund loading, withdrawals, and direct payments.
Implemented secure API integrations with bank-grade encryption and OTP verification for all financial operations involving local payment providers.
Provided role-based dashboards for users and administrators with real-time transaction monitoring and reconciliation tools.
Designed for high scalability, reliability, and compliance with local financial regulations to support a growing user base across Ethiopia.
